headline: 2 Magnificent S&P 500 Dividend Stocks to Buy for a Lifetime of Passive Income
summary: Finding stocks that have long-lasting megatrends working in their favor can be an excellent way to generate new investment ideas.  Two companies that meet these requirements are American Tower (NYSE: AMT) and Public Storage (NYSE: PSA).  With total returns of 760% and 3,590% since 2000 compared to the S&P 500's mark of 540%, these stocks have a history of beating the market.
